[Page Title: Sea Biscuit Cafe: A Charming Spot for Southern Breakfast in Isle of Palms]

Charming Beach Cafe

Southern Charm & Delicious Flavors

Experience the quaint atmosphere at Sea Biscuit Cafe where every dish is prepared with love and care. Savor the taste of southern breakfast like never before.

Efficient Service

Quick & Friendly Service
Reserve Now 
Pet-Friendly & Scenic

Enjoy Your Meal with a View

Bring your furry friend along to Sea Biscuit Cafe and enjoy a delicious meal with a view of the Atlantic Ocean. The perfect spot for a relaxing dining experience.
View Menu 
Hello dear

Welcome to Sea Biscuit Cafe

Sea Biscuit Cafe, located in Isle of Palms, SC, is a charming beach cafe serving up delicious American breakfast and brunch options. With a cozy atmosphere and friendly service, this women-owned establishment offers a wide range of menu choices, from haddock chowder to blueberry walnut French toast. Customers love the quaint patio seating and dog-friendly environment, making it a perfect spot for a pre-beach breakfast or a leisurely brunch. The menu features build-your-own omelettes, biscuits, and a variety of soups and sandwiches. Don't miss out on the chance to experience southern breakfast like no other at Sea Biscuit Cafe.
see more 
People talk

Guestbook

“ Cash only, but ATM on site. Pretty small restaurant, expect to wait a bit for a table. Food is good & service is efficient - you'll be in and out pretty quickly! Solid pre-beach breakfast ”

- Natalie M.

“ Good was excellent. So many choices. We got several items and split to have a taste of everything. Service was quick and friendly! Patio was cute and reminded me of sitting in grandmas back porch. ”

- Shawna B.

“ This spot in downtown Digby NS was quite the find! Great atmosphere and great food! At our table of four we ordered two haddock chowders and two cheese and chicken soups which were all flavorful and delicious. We also got our soups with a half sandwich which ranged from tuna to egg salad to ham. I had the ham, which was also great! We did not end up ordering dessert, but I did tack on a latte which was balanced and well prepared as well. A great spot in Digby, do not miss! ”

- Kerrie D.

“ I brought the family here for an early morning breakfast. We got there when it opened so it was not busy and we waited just a minute to be seated. The menu is vast and you certainly can choose something that you like. The service was very good and the restaurant was clean. Blueberry walnut French toast was amazing. I heard it was a local favorite and it certainly is delicious. All the menu items we ordered were very good and I highly recommend stopping here but try and get here early to avoid the later crowd. ”

- Rob S.

“ Words can't express how much I loved this spot! We were looking for a dog friendly place with a good menu. When we pulled up, it was a quaint little restaurant with plenty of parking because most people walked there. We got a dog friendly place with a fantastic menu. After seating us, the immediately brought my pup water. So much so that we drove back a second day to eat what we didn't order the first time. They are cash only and have a conveniently placed ATM. This restaurant has turned into a staple for whenever we return to IOP. ”

- M J.

in Menu

Positive Reviews

About

Sea Biscuit Cafe

Sea Biscuit Cafe, located in Isle of Palms, SC, is a charming coffee and tea spot that also serves American-style breakfast and brunch. This women-owned cafe offers a range of utilities, including takeout, delivery, and reservation options, making it convenient for any dining occasion. The cafe is wheelchair accessible and welcomes all, with gender-neutral restrooms and a dog-friendly atmosphere. With a menu featuring a wide variety of dishes, from haddock chowder to build-your-own omelettes, Sea Biscuit Cafe caters to diverse tastes.

Customer reviews rave about the efficient service and delicious food, such as the blueberry walnut French toast and the flavorful soups and sandwiches. The cozy atmosphere, friendly staff, and dog-friendly amenities make dining here a memorable experience. Sitting at the patio feels like being at grandma's back porch, adding a homely touch to your meal. The cafe's close proximity to the Atlantic Ocean adds a special charm, allowing diners to soak in the salt air while enjoying their meal.

Personally, I was impressed by the variety of options on the menu and the quality of the dishes served. The Southern-style breakfast offerings, such as the heavenly biscuits, left me craving for more. The cafe's commitment to sustainability with reusable tableware and acceptance of cryptocurrencies adds an extra layer of appeal. Overall, Sea Biscuit Cafe offers a delightful dining experience that combines delicious food, efficient service, and a welcoming atmosphere.

Book a table

Make A Reservation

You can Book a table online easily in just a couple of minutes. Just check the availability of your table & book it now!
Please contact the phone number (843) 886-4079

[Page Title: Menu - Sea Biscuit Cafe]

Discover

Menu Sea Biscuit Cafe
Home Menu 
Introducing the menu at Sea Biscuit Cafe, a charming coffee and tea spot in Isle of Palms, SC. This women-owned establishment offers a variety of options for breakfast and brunch, with a menu that caters to all tastes and dietary preferences. Customers rave about the efficient service, tasty food, and cozy atmosphere. The blueberry walnut French toast is a must-try, while the build-your-own omelette with home fries and a biscuit receives high praise. The cafe is dog-friendly, with water provided for furry companions. With happy hour specials, alcohol, and a diverse menu ranging from soups to sandwiches, Sea Biscuit Cafe is a top choice for a pre-beach breakfast or a leisurely brunch. Don't miss out on the delicious dishes and friendly service at this gem in downtown Isle of Palms.
